utils.helpers package¶

Submodules¶

utils.helpers.api_utils module¶

utils.helpers.api_utils.build_api_url(endpoint: str, host: str = 'localhost', port: int = 8000) → str¶

Build the API URL

Args:

endpoint (str): API endpoint host (str, optional): Host name. Defaults to “localhost”. port (int, optional): Port. Defaults to 8000.

Returns:

str: API URL

async utils.helpers.api_utils.send_request_to_face_encoding(endpoint: str = 'v1/selfie', host: str = 'face-encoding', port: int = 8000, contents: bytes = None, timeout: int = 60) → Response¶

Send a request to the face-encoding service

Args:

endpoint (str, optional): Endpoint to send the request. Defaults to “v1/selfie”. host (str, optional): Host name of the face-encoding service. Defaults to “face-encoding”. port (int, optional): Port of the face-encoding service. Defaults to 8000. timeout (int, optional): Timeout of the request. Defaults to 60.

Returns:

httpx.Response: Response from the face-encoding service

utils.helpers.session_utils module¶

utils.helpers.session_utils.convert_bytes_to_megabytes(size_in_bytes: int, decimal_places: int = 2) → float¶

Converts the given size in bytes to megabytes.

Parameters: size_in_bytes (int): The size to be converted from bytes to megabytes. decimal_places (int): The number of decimal places to round the result to.

Returns: float: The size converted to megabytes rounded to 2 decimal places.

utils.helpers.session_utils.generate_unique_id()¶

A function to generate a unique ID using timestamp, random string, and hashlib. No parameters. Returns a string representing the ID.

Face Encoder
